title: Configuration Management
description: 프로젝트는 환경별 설정을 관리할 수 있어야 함

acceptance_criteria.AC-1: 환경별 설정 파일 분리 (dev, staging, prod)
acceptance_criteria.AC-4: 설정 변경 시 재시작 없이 반영 가능

acceptance_criteria.AC-1: 데이터 모델 정의 및 스키마 관리

title: Reliability
measurement: 장애 발생 빈도 및 복구 시간 추적

title: Security
measurement: 보안 스캔 도구를 통한 취약점 검사

preconditions.description: All dependent UoWs must be completed
Foundation layer services must be available
Precondition from AC-001: 검증할 데이터가 준비된 상태에서
Precondition from AC-002: 설정 가능한 환경이 준비된 상태에서
Precondition from AC-003: 설정 가능한 환경이 준비된 상태에서
Precondition from AC-004: 시스템이 정상적으로 동작하는 상태에서

postconditions.description: Result from AC-001: 검증 결과가 올바르게 반환되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-001: 입력값이 유효성 검사를 통과해야 한다
Result from AC-002: 설정이 올바르게 적용되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-002: 성능 요구사항이 충족되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-002: 오류 처리가 적절해야 한다
Result from AC-003: 설정이 올바르게 적용되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-003: 성능 요구사항이 충족되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-003: 오류 처리가 적절해야 한다
Result from AC-004: Comprehensive error handling and detailed messages
success_criteria: Comprehensive error handling and detailed messages

postconditions.description: Additional condition from AC-004: 결과가 예상된 형태로 반환되어야 한다
Additional condition from AC-004: 시스템 상태가 일관성을 유지해야 한다

name: ai-ml
description: AI and Machine Learning integration requirements

FR-AI-001.name: Model Management
FR-AI-001.description: ML model deployment and lifecycle management

FR-AI-002.name: Data Pipeline
FR-AI-002.description: Data ingestion and preprocessing for ML workflows
FR-AI-002.business_value: Quality data for ML training and inference

FR-AI-003.name: Inference Engine
FR-AI-003.description: Real-time and batch ML model inference

FR-AI-004.name: Training Pipeline
FR-AI-004.description: Automated ML model training and retraining

FR-AI-005.name: Vector Database Integration
FR-AI-005.description: Vector storage and similarity search for embeddings
acceptance_criteria: Similarity search and nearest neighbor queries

FR-AI-006.name: LLM Integration
FR-AI-006.description: Large Language Model integration and orchestration
acceptance_criteria: Token usage monitoring and cost optimization

NFR-AI-001.name: Inference Latency
NFR-AI-001.description: AI model inference must meet real-time requirements

NFR-AI-002.name: Model Accuracy
NFR-AI-002.description: AI models must maintain acceptable accuracy levels

NFR-AI-003.name: Data Privacy and Ethics
NFR-AI-003.description: AI systems must respect privacy and ethical guidelines
NFR-AI-003.testing_method: Bias testing, privacy audits, ethical review

NFR-AI-004.name: Scalability for AI Workloads
NFR-AI-004.description: System must scale for varying AI compute demands
measurement_criteria: Cost optimization for cloud AI services

UoW-AI-402.name: Data Pipeline Infrastructure
UoW-AI-402.goal: Build data processing pipeline for ML workflows

UoW-AI-404.name: Training Automation System
UoW-AI-404.goal: Automated ML training and retraining pipeline

UoW-AI-405.name: Vector Database Integration
UoW-AI-405.goal: Implement vector storage and similarity search

UoW-AI-406.name: LLM Integration Service
UoW-AI-406.goal: Large Language Model integration and management

name: e-commerce
description: E-commerce specific requirements for online retail applications

FR-EC-001.name: Product Catalog Management
FR-EC-001.description: Comprehensive product catalog with categories and inventory
acceptance_criteria: Product CRUD operations with categories and attributes
Image and media management for products
Price management with discounts and promotions

FR-EC-002.name: Shopping Cart Management
FR-EC-002.description: User shopping cart functionality with persistence
acceptance_criteria: Guest and authenticated user cart support

FR-EC-004.name: Payment Processing
FR-EC-004.description: Secure payment gateway integration and processing

NFR-EC-001.name: High Availability for Peak Traffic
NFR-EC-001.description: System must handle peak shopping periods (Black Friday, holidays)
measurement_criteria: Support 10x normal traffic during peak periods
CDN integration for static content delivery

NFR-EC-002.name: PCI DSS Compliance
NFR-EC-002.description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard compliance
measurement_criteria: Encrypted card data transmission and storage

NFR-EC-003.name: Search Performance
NFR-EC-003.description: Product search must be fast and relevant
measurement_criteria: Search response time: < 100ms for product queries

UoW-EC-302.name: Shopping Cart System
acceptance_criteria: Guest cart to user cart migration

FR-FT-001.title: Payment Processing
FR-FT-001.description: 다양한 결제 수단 처리 및 관리

FR-FT-003.title: KYC/AML Compliance
FR-FT-003.business_value: 규제 준수 및 법적 리스크 방지

FR-FT-004.title: Financial Reporting
FR-FT-004.business_value: 정확한 재무 보고 및 규제 대응

name: gdpr
description: GDPR compliance requirements for EU data protection

FR-GDPR-001.name: Data Subject Rights Management
FR-GDPR-001.description: Implementation of GDPR data subject rights
acceptance_criteria: Right to access: Provide user data in structured format
Right to rectification: Allow data correction
Right to erasure: Implement data deletion
Right to portability: Export data in machine-readable format
Right to restrict processing: Suspend data processing

FR-GDPR-002.name: Consent Management
acceptance_criteria: Granular consent collection for different purposes

FR-GDPR-004.name: Privacy by Design Implementation
acceptance_criteria: Data minimization in collection and processing

FR-GDPR-005.name: Breach Detection and Notification
FR-GDPR-005.description: Data breach detection and notification system
acceptance_criteria: Data subject notification for high-risk breaches

FR-GDPR-006.name: Data Protection Officer Support
FR-GDPR-006.description: Tools and dashboards for DPO activities

NFR-GDPR-001.name: Data Subject Request Response Time
NFR-GDPR-001.description: Timely response to data subject rights requests
measurement_criteria: Portability requests: Data export within 30 days

NFR-GDPR-002.name: Cross-Border Data Transfer Compliance
NFR-GDPR-002.description: Adequate protection for international data transfers
measurement_criteria: Adequacy decision compliance for data transfers
Binding corporate rules for multinational organizations

NFR-GDPR-003.name: Privacy by Default Configuration
NFR-GDPR-003.description: Default settings must maximize privacy protection
measurement_criteria: Opt-in rather than opt-out for non-essential processing

UoW-GDPR-501.name: Data Subject Rights API
UoW-GDPR-501.goal: Implement API endpoints for GDPR data subject rights

UoW-GDPR-502.name: Consent Management System
UoW-GDPR-502.goal: Build comprehensive consent collection and management

UoW-GDPR-503.name: Data Inventory System
UoW-GDPR-503.goal: Implement data processing inventory and mapping

UoW-GDPR-505.name: Breach Detection and Response
UoW-GDPR-505.goal: Automated breach detection and notification system
